process.title: Discover & Align
process.description: Frame business goals, uncover user realities, and build a shared definition of success with leadership and delivery teams.

process.title: Define the Bets
process.description: Translate insight into opportunity areas, experience principles, and prioritized experiments that ladder back to measurable outcomes.

process.title: Design & Prototype
process.description: Create layered prototypes—from service blueprints to polished UI—that bring the future state to life and gather fast validation.

process.title: Deliver & Iterate
process.description: Pair with engineering to launch confidently, measure adoption in the wild, and feed learning loops back into the roadmap.
